NHSpy-plotthedots is a Python package designed to make it easier to produce statistical process control (SPC) charts, which are a widely well-regarded way to report on KPIs in trusts and other organisations across the country.

![](image.png)

## More about SPC charts

Take a look at our [technique page](../../techniques/spc/spc.qmd) for more information about the theory behind SPC charts.

Looking for some code snippets? Head to our [graph page](../../graph_catalogue/spc/spc.qmd).
